I feel like: absolute garbage\, has lost the soul of george lucas' star wars. the disney creative team seem more interested in jamming this new trilogy with identitarian gender and race politics than creating a well thought out story\, all the characters are tokens\, which is exactly the outcome identity politics was trying to prevent. \noverall poorly written. poorly paced and trashes almost all of the continuity of forty years of star wars
